findings.title: Reentrancy vulnerability in nonReentrant modifier
findings.description: The nonReentrant modifier does not prevent reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Unauthorized script upgrade potential in updatePool and updateEmissionRate functions
findings.description: The updatePool and updateEmissionRate functions have a potential unauthorized script upgrade vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in setDevAddress and setFeeAddress functions
findings.description: The setDevAddress and setFeeAddress functions contain unprotected function calls, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens in mint function
findings.description: The mint function allows the owner to mint an unlimited number of tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized token transfer in transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function may allow unauthorized token transfers due to a potential vulnerability.
